body.name: KAER RX580 8GB Graphics Card GDDR5 256bit Computer Graphics Card with Dual Fans 1284/7000MHz,PCI Express 3.0 Gaming Graphics Card, DVI HDMI DP Desktop
features: 【 Powerful Gaming experience 】 The RX580 8GB features powerful graphics processing power, 1284MHz GPU speed and up to 7000 MHz high-performance gaming memory to smooth gaming and application experience.

【 Multi-interface HD display 】RX580 8G is equipped with DP*1, HDMI*1, DVI*1 three output ports, which can support high-definition display of three monitors at the same time, greatly improving the game performance. And the 580 uses the PCI-Express 3.0x16 interface, plug and play, easy to use.

【Excellent Heat dissipation and durability】 RX580 8G graphics card is equipped with a semi-intelligent dual cooling fan, which will automatically stop running when the GPU temperature is low or the load is low, providing you with a comfortable office experience with zero noise and extending the service life of the 8g graphics card.

【Multi-scene use】RX580 8G graphics card can meet the needs of different people on the computer, powerful performance can not only show high-quality graphics in the game, in the face of office, design, video editing and other aspects can also be comfortable, multi-task, quick switch smooth operation.

【 Good service 】RX580 8G can download this graphics card driver in AMD official website. If you have any questions in installation or use, please feel free to contact us, we will always provide you with excellent after-sales service.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 97 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High cost performance graphics card High cost performance graphics card About the game: RX580 8G performance is very good, in the video card market, it can still occupy the game graphics card cost-effective position. In terms of games, you can not only play PUBG, Cyberpunk, Call of Duty, Assassin's Creed and other major games, but also support Rainbow Six, CSGO, Overwatch 2 and other mainstream games. This means that the RX580 8G can meet your gaming needs. About the Value: RX580 8G is the current user feedback of high cost performance card. It is not only the user's game graphics card but also the design graphics card. In terms of performance. The RX580 8G is still a mid-range graphics card, but it sells at a lower Value as card makers look to new products.

The graphics card functions in the scene Video card Size Length: 11 inches Height: 1.57 inches Height: 5.5 inches Dual fan graphics cards support the MITA chassis Video card interface RX580 8G display can play a variety of games, such as: League of Legends PUBG, Assassin's Creed and other popular games Available Function Scenarios ·RX580 8G graphics card supports 4K resolution ·RX580 graphics card supports output from two monitors simultaneously ·RX580 graphics card supports three different output interfaces: HDMI/DP/DVI · The RX580 graphics card needs 8Pin power supply, and the recommended power supply is more than 400W

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IT WORKS WELL for big open world games!
reviews.reviewText: After having a 1650 for a couple of years, I really wanted something a little more powerful to be able to properly run, stream and play big open world games that have a lot of resources in them. Well, I can say after testing out Ark Survival, Palworld, Minecraft and others with the 2060, it does the job! The graphics don’t lie here. I was able to play games smoothly on the highest graphic settings. I got no lags nor frame drops.Now, here’s the thing. I was a little worried at first that I wouldn’t be able play with this card, because of the 8 pin connector that is needed to be installed into it. However, you don’t exactly need the 8 pin. You actually can just use a 6 pin and then easily squeeze a 2 pin making it 8. It’ll still work that way. Your power supply should definitely have both the 6 pin and 2 pin. If not, then you would have to buy an 8 pin connector or simply buy a new power supply. Plus, this card isn’t that expensive or at least it’s not in my budget, but if you’re considering on wanting to move up from the 1000s, get into streaming or playing in much better quality, then the 2060 I highly recommend. Of course we will have different PCs. Therefore, it really depends on what kind of graphics card your PC can take or not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because it has 3× the performance(advertised) as my old card. It looks as cheap as the price tag but it runs nice and cold. The fans work well and make little noise. The inside of my case stay cooler than the house. No lights which is a plus for me because im not trying to stare at my card. Im trying to stare at my tv to see what the card is making. It automatically installed drivers and set itself up for my tv. Full auto-graphics recognition on newer games. Downside: It is huge, as large as a size 11 mens sneaker. It blocks 2 slots on the board. Requires external power from PCI/E power. Thats pretty normal nowadays though so have at it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Pleased with this purchase
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the RX 580 8GB graphics card for a while now, and I couldn't be happier with it. This card is an absolute powerhouse. What's even more impressive is the affordability. I was pleasantly surprised by the value for the price. It's a budget-friendly choice that doesn't compromise on performance.Reliability is a big deal for me. It runs smoothly during long sessions, and I've not had any overheating issues or crashes. The cooling system keeps the card at a comfortable temperature, and it's surprisingly quiet.This card's versatility is another highlight. It's not just for gaming; it handles content creation tasks like video editing and 3D rendering like a pro.In a nutshell, the RX 580 8GB graphics card is an absolute joy. It's affordable, powerful, reliable, and versatile. As a happy user, I highly recommend it to anyone looking for an exceptional productivity experience without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great card and easy install
reviews.reviewText: This card was used to upgrade an older ASUS gaming pc, removed the old OEM card,, and did not need the OEM bracket. Plugged this card in, tightened 2 screws, plugged in the power cable and BAM - was running in no time. The PC goes through a self update - taks a few min, and then its set. (Coudl be unique to ASUS) but no issues at all. Games and editing were fast! Definitely worth buying!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars #idgafgamepc Great GPU, Plays BF1,BF5,FS22 W/ I7-2600 & 35$mboard.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. i grabbed this after my DELL 990 SFF w/ a r260 card was USELESS too try and play BFV, OR BF1.. tHIS GOT ME UP AND PALYING, I let this hang outside the case, grabbed a PCI extension cable, 500W atx PSU, (LEFT IT OUT OOF THE CASE) and a used intel i7-2600k or w.e.. all in i think for 168$ I got a older Dell too now play games I played on PS3... AND i can surf web etc..I just got into building PCs... And i figured outquick that trying too build a SFF gaming rig CAN BE DONE.. But for now, im just using a full size case, after i built the dell.. I used this GPU, THE 35$ MBOARD, 13$ rgb fan, 35$ PSU, ram from the 16gb DELL, and HDD & SDD...Threw in a fullsize case i found in junk pile (AFTER I CLEANED IT UP) grabbed a 13$ amazon special LGA115# AIR COOLER (THE WHITE ONE THAT STICKS OUT THE SIDE, 6X COOLER PIPES? IDFK.. And another cpl cheap fans, IDK, it saty down in the 90'* so guess they work also...Used a old car alarm LED & MINI DPDT ON-OFF-ON toggle for the power on, and POWER/HDD lights..And hey, IT WORKS!.. the #idgafgamepc AINT PRETTY. But man its alot faster, easier too work on then a SFF dell..I can play BF1-BFV with like hardly any interruptions. My brother says its plays as good as his $ALIENWARE used gaming laptop.. idk.. lolBut really happy with this GPU.. I AM NO PC GURU.. did not try overclock it.. BUT i didn't have too.. I just tuned the fan too come on sooner, adjusted the power use (it works fine with AMD ADRENALINE software) and at pretty much stock settings with all the other cheap AMAZON COMPONENTS, except for CPU AND RAM) BUT.... I can play BFV pretty well.. think i had it set on 1280../720, and all graphics at low, filters off etc.. On medium/auto? it still works decent too.. But its best at low settings, Im perfectly happy way it plays and looks on low settings.. oh yea, It brought my PC BENCHMARK SCORE UP FROM A "LOG (R270) -UP TOO A SAILBOAT".... and for now, im gonna run it, while i search for my next plans and pc parts too build..the MB i used..https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BBMFSWY9?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_detailsI noticed it this GPU Def likes a better PSU, and CPU, And a open case too keep it cool.. that goes without saying for PC.s again, im a newb.. but not too building hardware and stuff.. And this thing has been running, nonstop for like 2 months now.. No problems.. I just made sure too add a case fan in back, too get heat in-out, then i added another, smaller 40mm? fan out of a dell on the front of my case also..The fan on the GPU is a little loud, when gaming, But honestly i dot mind louder fans on a PC.. and thats why i got goo soundbar.. Usually keep desktop away from screen anyway..IMHO.. Dont wast you time with othe GPU's, especially thos BS little 50-70$ ones.. Just grab something like this.. Its not the best.. But its awesome if your at a 100$ budget for a GPU.. and if you just wanta hookup, and start gaming, It will.. Im happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hit or Miss
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these cards. One worked the other worked until drivers are installed. Then would no longer display within the OS. I sent back for a refund. I will also note the first card that worked came with the back plate screws lose and almost unscrewed. I had to tighten them to keep the back plate from raddling when the fans spun up. Over all its hit or miss with this card.
